org.modelio.api.ui.swt

Class SelectionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.api.ui.swt.SelectionHelper

  • public final class SelectionHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to manipulate ISelection objects.

    All the methods check the selection is a IStructuredSelection. Selection objects not matching this criteria are treated as empty selections.

    Since:
    3.7.1
    See Also:
    ISelection, IStructuredSelection

      • contains

        public static boolean contains(org.eclipse.jface.viewers.ISelection selection,
                               java.lang.Class<?> cls)
        Tells whether the selection contains at least one element of the given type.

        Returns false if the selection is empty.

        Parameters:
        selection - a selection object
        cls - the required type
        Returns:
        true if the selection contains at least one such element.

      • containsOnly

        public static boolean containsOnly(org.eclipse.jface.viewers.ISelection selection,
                                   java.lang.Class<?> cls)
        Tells whether the selection contains only elements of the given type.

        Returns false if the selection is empty.

        Parameters:
        selection - a selection object
        cls - the required type
        Returns:
        true if the selection is not empty and contains only such elements.

      • toList

                                           java.lang.Class<T> cls)
        Convert the selection object to a list of the given type.

        All selection elements not matching the type are filtered out.

        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
